metadata.name: NEW BEGINNINGS
metadata.description:
The Sound Healing Journey is the first-ever audio/visual sound healing NFT collection. Created with the intent for you to receive a well-deserved moment to slow down within the fast-paced web3 space, take a few deep breaths with this sacred song channeled just for you.

“NEW BEGINNINGS” is the 1st of an 8 song series recorded in one take. With 8 unique 1/1 NFTs, each experience has its own distinctive journey.

Producer & creative director: RO
Photographer: Enrique Malfavon
Set styling & design: CC Elise
Assistant: Miguel Cortes
Mixing/mastering: Mike Rupe
Sound recording studio: Simple Equations Media
Video editor: Dax Miller
Hair & color: Salvador Rubio
Photo/video studio: The Art Haven

About the creator:
RO is a visual content consultant, sound healing practitioner & multidisciplinary artist specializing in collaborative NFTs that bridge the magic of art, sound + healing.
